title: Tower of Dreams
description: Blaine Ramsey is an image-digger. He dreams images, and turns them into computer-animated ads for an American conglomerate. While stationed in Egypt, Blaine catches a glimpse of a brutal attack on a young Arab beauty. He is tormented by the violent act--a nightmare from which he cannot escape. But Blaine soon discovers that the woman's appearance in his dreams represents more than his own outrage at human cruelty.
author: Jamil Nasir
